Package com.composum.ai.composum.bundle.model

Class TranslationDialogModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.pages.commons.model.AbstractModel
      • com.composum.ai.composum.bundle.model.TranslationDialogModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.composum.pages.commons.model.Model, com.composum.sling.core.SlingBean
    public class TranslationDialogModel
extends com.composum.pages.commons.model.AbstractModel
    Model for rendering the translation dialog. It gets instantiated on a property resource, e.g. page/cr:content/jcr:description .

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  TranslationDialogModel.Source
      Represents a source for translation.

    • Field Detail

      • propertyName

        protected String propertyName
        The name of the property for which the translation dialog is opened, e.g. "jcr:title", "title", "text", ...

      • propertyI18nPath

        protected String propertyI18nPath
        The path where the property is actually saved according to our i18n method, e.g. "i18n/de/text".
